attributes.action: Hold a national referendum on changing the minimum voting age from 18 to 16.
attributes.additional_details: Whilst a Government may have a large parliamentary majority they can achieve this with a low share of the national vote. Significant constitutional change should have a level of support that is deeper than a parliamentary majority.  The best way to achieve this is with a national referendum.
attributes.background: Such significant constitutional change should have the full backing of the country, not just Parliament. Pass legislation that requires this and any future government to require a national referendum for any changes to our voting system.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

We call for a referendum before extending voting rights to 16 & 17-year-olds: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733679
